result.reason: PuTTY/SSH connections overwrite the tab title with the terminal window title, removing the logon information suffix. The fix is to re-append this information in PuttyBase if the option is enabled.
result.approach: Modify PuttyBase.ResolveTabText to check Properties.OptionsTabsPanelsPage.Default.ShowLogonInfoOnTabs and append the configured username/domain to the resolved terminal title, ensuring consistency with ConnectionWindow behavior.
